title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reveals the latest on Aaron Rodgers, his decision to return to the Packers next season and why he believes Rodgers is leaning towards leaving Green Bay for the first time. He looks at the Dallas Cowboys pursuing their first Lombardi Trophy since 1995 and the one thing holding them back from winning it. He also believes there is one NFL team looking to upgrade their quarterback that would surprise most people. Plus, Fox Sports NFL Insider Peter Schrager joins the show to tell Colin if Kyler Murray is justified in his latest contract demands.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
